posts.description: Same But Different: Little Simz in Johannesburg with Gigi Lamayne - YouTube
posts.extended: First experiencing South Africa on set for the music video of her breakthrough hit 'Gratitude', Little Simz returned this summer to explore the Johannesburg music scene. After meeting South African rapper Gigi Lamayne as part of Nandoâ€™s Music Exchange programme, Noisey joined the two young artists
